            <string language="hu-HU">A forgószél ereje</string>
            <string language="en-US">Power of the whirlwind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie des Whirlwind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance du tourbillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência do whirlwind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza del whirlwind</string>

          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A forgószél erejét, illetve formáját bemutató felvétel</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie das Demonstrieren der Energie und der
Form des Whirlwind dar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrivez démontrer la puissance et la forme du 
tourbillon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrate demonstrar a potência e a forma do 
whirlwind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descriva la dimostrazione l'potenza e della figura
del whirlwind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα που καταδεικνύει τη δύναμη και τη μορφή του 
whirlwind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Represente demostrar la potencia y la dimensión 
de una variable del torbellino</string>
          </description>
